channel.title: Documentation on Pionia
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on Pionia

item.title: API Tutorial
item.description: This section assumes that you have already setup your pinia framework project. If you haven’t done done, please head over to Installation. This guide also introduces you to the implementation of the Moonlight architecture, so you can check it out first to get familiar with the terminologies. Out Target We should be able to accomplish the following tasks by the end of this tutorial: Connect to an existing database. Create a new to-do item in the database.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Welcome to the official documentation of pionia - /ˌpʌɪəˈnɪə/ framework. Pionia is a PHP Rest Framework that is truly RESTful. It is designed to be simple, lightweight, and easy to use. Pionia is built on top of the Moonlight architecture, which is a powerful architecture for powering highly scaling REST projects. Pionia provides a set of tools and conventions that make it easy to build RESTful APIs in PHP.

item.title: Structure
item.description: This section assumes that you have already setup your pinia framework project. If you haven’t done done, please head over to Installation. This guide also introduces you to the implementation of the Moonlight architecture, so you can check it out first to get familiar with the terminologies. Out Target We should be able to accomplish the following tasks by the end of this tutorial: Connect to an existing database. Create a new to-do item in the database.
